title: Chinese Plane Crash Follows Rapid Growth at Airline Without Safety Incidents
sub_head: China Eastern Airlines has become one of the world’s largest carriers amid a boom in Chinese air travel
body:
China Eastern Airlines Corp. has grown over the past three decades to become one of the world’s biggest carriers by catering to a vast new market of Chinese travelers.
Until this week, its rapid rise—like that of China’s broader aviation industry—had also been largely without safety incidents.
